entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:01 PM NST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 01:45 AM NST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow and Blowing Snow, -16.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Blanc-Sablon Airport 01:50 AM AST Saturday 04 February 2023
Condition: Light Snow and Blowing Snow
Temperature: -16.7°C
Pressure / Tendency: 97.3 kPa rising
Visibility: 1.6 km
Humidity: 82 %
Wind Chill: -31
Dewpoint: -19.1°C
Wind: W 48 km/h gust 70 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 19.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow. Blowing snow over exposed areas. Wind southwest 60 km/h gusting to 80. Low minus 19. Wind chill minus 34 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 01:47 AM NST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Periods of light snow. High minus 10.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow. Blowing snow over exposed areas. Wind southwest 50 km/h gusting to 80. High minus 10. Wind chill minus 34 in the morning and minus 21 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 01:47 AM NST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Clearing. Low minus 20.
entry.summary: Clearing in the evening. Blowing snow over exposed areas. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming northwest 70 gusting to 90 in the evening then diminishing to 40 gusting to 60 overnight. Low minus 20. Wind chill minus 21 in the evening and minus 33 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 01:47 AM NST Saturday 04 February 2023
